Text:
Having downloaded and listened to this I can give an honest opinion. It certainly is a high quality rip but nothing any Bob Marley fan who has downloaded a rip of this one hasn't heard before. 

I do think mine is slightly better (of course I would say that but really I do). Any Bob Marley fan deserves to download both and make up their own mind.

...and that's the final word from MC Fakin
Mine was sourced from the same. Get a clue before you bash.
Go on, keep up with the bashing and curse words. This only serves to make you look bad, not me.
...and how is it you know my stuff is inferior, you never listen to anything I put out.
